This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Trying to photo plane, and UFO came into view.
divs: sighting detailsi was following high flying aircraft to take photo with my new camera (canon eos rebel xsi)using a 250mm lens set at shutter priority 1\4000 sec. no filter focus on auto and continous shutter about 3 frames per second.i was in my back deck facing west. the airplane was traveling from ne. to sw. direction, when i was ready to take airplane picture i notice this object coming the oposite way sw. to ne.so i decided to follow object, at first it looked like a round light, but then it started to change forms. i took 41 pictures in sequence,then the object disapeared i am sending you three (3) of them. hope you can tell me what it was.
